alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 25 at 4:02PM EDT until March 26 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT TONIGHT. THIS REPLACES THE WIND ADVISORY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...In Ohio, Ashtabula Inland, Summit, Portage, Trumbull, Stark and Mahoning Counties. In Pennsylvania, Crawford County. * WHEN...Until midnight EDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
